text: Menen Men Jippinii Tawreeta, hino e mayre Peewal e Annoora. Hino ñaawira nden Annabaaɓe ɓen jebbiliiɓe, wonannde ɓen alyahuudaa ɓe, e ɓen rewooɓe e jannguɓe ɓen, sabu kon ko ɓe reeninaa ka Deftere Alla, ɓe laatii e dow ɗum ko ɓe seediiɓe. Wata on hulu yimɓe ɓen, hulee Lam Min. Wata on sooditiri Aayeeje Am ɗen cogguyel pamaroy. Kala mo ñaawiraali ko Alla Jippini kon, ko ɓen ɗon woni heeferɓe ɓen
